alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; Inland Onslow (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 5:58PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Onslow and southeastern Duplin Counties through 630 PM EDT... At 558 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cypress Creek, or 15 miles west of Half Moon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New River Station, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Richlands, Cypress Creek, Verona, Catherine Lake, Chinquapin, Albert J Ellis Airport, Richlands South and Haws Run. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
